title: Complete Discography of W.H.E.A.T.
description:
Freshly updated to include SIX new recordings from W.H.E.A.T!

W.H.E.A.T. is the world's premier mistake-core band, specializing in terrible sound quality, badly improvised music, very low instrumental proficiency, and pants-shittingly offensive lyrics!  W.H.E.A.T. makes music with the intention of using it as a weapon against the audience, to cause maximum discomfort!
Presented here, for your listening displeasure, is W.H.E.A.T.'s COMPLETE DISCOGRAPHY!!!

What's new:

-BREAD - The recently recovered experimental noise composition, created by longtime band friend Addramyr.

-W.H.E.A.T. Gets Serious (And Fails) - A retroactively subsumed (stolen) recording of members of W.H.E.A.T. attempting to start a serious band.

- It's Not Stealing If It's In The Trash - A full length album of retroactively subsumed (stolen) recordings recycled from various side projects over the years, some with newly added vocals and instrumentals.

-Too Little Too Late - Outtakes from the most recent recording session, with the sound quality drastically lowered for maximum non-enjoyment!

-Short Deadline, Poor Resources, Bad Plan - The all-new studio album from W.H.E.A.T.!

-Making Noisy Noise Noisier - An E.P. of remixes of various songs from over the years, as well as some new, remix-inspired recordings from Mark

What's old:
-All your favorite albums from W.H.E.A.T. updated with new official album artwork!


Contents:
01   - I Hear Instruments, But That's Not Music
01.2 - BREAD
02   - The Microphone Off Sessions
03   - Legends of Tales, Many Ages Past
03.5 - To The Maxxx, With Power And Suckulence
04   - Taste The Rainbow (With Your Butthole)
05   - Satire Doesn't Seem Like The Right Word When You've Taken It This Far
06   - Unicorn Powerhouse
07   - Nobody Does What We Do. Nobody Can. Nobody Wants to.
08   - I Hope, For Your Sake, You Don't Hear From Us Very Soon
09   - Diarrhonstipation
10   - Brought To You By Condoms!
11   - Failed Instrumenstruation
12   - I Just Want To Get My Dick In There
13   - You Should Never Have Trusted Us
14   - We're B-Side Ourself With Rage
14.5 - W.H.E.A.T. Gets Serious (And Fails)
15   - Molten Feces
16   - We're Not Even Trying Anymore
17   - Bouncing Clowns And Silly Animals
18   - You Wish We Wouldn't, But We're Gonna
19   - It's Not Stealing If It's In The Trash
19.5 - Too Little Too Late
20   - Short Deadline, Poor Resources, Bad Plan
20.5 - Making Noisy Noise Noisier

Compilations:
     - Gay Bashin' Classics!
     - The Very Worst Of W.H.E.A.T.
     - More Of The Worst
